mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cistsys.SYS_LOGIN_LOG (user_pk, username, login_time, user_cn, ip, user_flag ) VALUES ( cistsys.SEQ_SYS_LOGIN_LOG.nextval, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{login_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{user_cn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

INSERT INTO cistsys.SYS_OPERATION_LOG (syol_id, syol_user_cn, sypi_pk, syol_request_url, syol_ip, syol_time, syol_content, syol_action, syol_type, syol_param_values, syol_err_location, syol_ex_msg, syol_flag ) VALUES ( cistsys.SEQ_SYS_LOG.nextval, #{syol_user_cn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sypi_pk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syol_request_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syol_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syol_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{syol_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syol_action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syol_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syol_param_values,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syol_err_location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syol_ex_msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syol_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
